intro:
Hi! I'm KevFR, a French student making
videos on YouTube, passionate about
computing and video games!
who: Pleased to meet you, my name is Kevin, a 17-year-old French student and nerd, holder of a high school diploma and a STMG baccalaureate. Since the age of 8, I have been interested in everything related to computers and video games. In my free time, I create mods for Progressbar 95, learn to compose my own music, and do computer graphics.
statut: I am currently doing a HND in SME
quest1: Why “KevFR”, and an Enderman as avatar?
answer1:
I chose “KevFR” since the mix between my first name and “FR” for France was a good fit.
And for my avatar, I simply find Enderman stylish and blue is my favorite color!
quest2: What motivated you to offer this type of content?
answer2:
In my opinion, it is mainly to provide assistance and raise awareness of IT among a novice audience.
IT is a fascinating subject, but one that is too often overlooked (which is a shame!).
kevfr8studio: Founder of a showcase studio specializing in game development.
ytbdesc: IT, tutorials and videos on Progressbar95
vorapis: Extension to hide ads and Shorts
list: Click here to find out more!
pbtouch: Concept based on Windows Phone in the Progressbar95 universe.
xbar180: Concept based on Xbox 360 in the Progressbar95 universe.
